profile:
Need carpet?  Well you've found the right guys. 

Areas include(but not limited to) Oshawa, Whitby, Ajax, Pickering, Bowmanville, Port Perry, Courtice, Markham, Stouffville, Scarborough, Aurora, Newmarket and all surrounding areas in the Greater Toronto Area! 

We've saved our customers hundreds & thousands of dollars when comparing quotations provided by 'the competition'.  Unlike the competition, we don't just sell the carpet, our professional team installs it also.

How can we offer such great savings?  Unlike the competition, we keep our overhead costs to a minimum while delivering absolute professional results. Also because of our amazing Shop At Home Shop Experience. Your room is the showroom because we bring our carpet & flooring samples to you when you call us (416-931-8887)!  Large selection & many styles.  Our savings become your savings. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.    
 
Our Price are AMAZING.  Our carpet/flooring quality and installation is amazing!

We've got all the right tools, equipment, team and expertise to professionally install your floor.  

We always greatly appreciate referrals and positive feedback from our clients.  
 
We do not sell any defective or second-grade flooring. We provide a one year installation warranty(although there shouldn't be any issues for many years).   

Call us for your Free Measurement and Quote Today! 416-931-8887 or e-mail info@fnsflooring.com 

Residential & Commercial.

***

Father and Sons Flooring Ltd is proudly Canadian owned and operated.   With decades of experience in the flooring industry, we have an in-depth and superior understanding of flooring.  

One room, one floor, one house, one building, banquet halls, office buildings or hotels - our seasoned professionals have worked in all these environments delivering excellent results in very timely fashions. 

We also offer wholesale flooring materials, supplies and other products to installers and retailers.

***

Our name was inspired by the late great Nick M.  With over 30+ years in the flooring industry, he successfully installed millions of square feet of flooring throughout Toronto/GTA and Ontario.  His knowledge and expertise was not only passed down to his children over the last several decades, but also to friends and others in the flooring industry.  He treated every son, as his son.  Any client/customer, as his family.  His honesty, integrity, kind, golden heart, sense of humor and exceptional work habits are a major inspiration to us.  Every project was completed to his perfection and embedded in the core of Father and Sons Flooring LTD.
